content: margaritaville designed by adrienne fong shown in regia cotton fun #4177 shown in red heart heart & sole pattern stitch using k1tbl p1 carried down instep gentle tropical breezes ocean waves lapping onto the shore seashell studded beaches refreshing umbrella drinks and more await you here in margaritaville relax enjoy have fun margaritaville copyright 2008 -2011 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry margaritaville designed by adrienne fong gentle tropical breezes ocean waves lapping onto the shore seashell studded beaches refreshing umbrella drinks and more await you here in margaritaville relax enjoy have fun size adult med 8 ankle /large 9 ankle sl - slip as if to purl unless otherwise noted k2tog/p2tog - knit/purl 2 stitches together materials pm- place marker 100 gm fingering weight sock yarn us size 1 5 2 5 mm needles or size to obtain gauge stitch markers instructions tapestry needle finished size cuff with 2 5 mm needles loosely cast on 64 72 7 1/2 8 1/2 leg circumference relaxed stitches join being careful not the twist your 7 1/2 8 1/2 foot circumference relaxed stitches place marker to indicate beginning of 6 leg length round work k1 tbl p1 ribbing for 10 rounds gauge 8 sts and 12 row/inch in stockinette set-up for leg medium k4 m1 k8 m1 7 times k4 72 sts notes large k3 m1 k6 m1 11 times k3 84 sts the pattern for the instep uses stockinette instead of the k1 tbl p1 used in the leg leg work rounds 1-10 of pattern stitch 4 times or feel free to continue the pattern as until leg is approximately 1/2 inch less than desired established if you prefer length ending on row 10 work rounds 1-8 once when two numbers are given the first more applies to the medium size and the second to the large size medium set-up for heel to center pattern over the size of the sock can be adjusted by instep using a smaller or larger needle for a round 1 k1 tbl p1 8 times ssk pm to indicate different gauge new beginning of round and start of instep work 37 sts in pattern as established pm to indicate abbreviations start of heel k2tog p1 k1 tbl 16 times 37 tbl - through back loop instep sts/33 heel sts round 2 knit even across 37 instep sts k1 p1 m1 - make one your choice of increase k1 tbl 15 times p1 k1 yo - yarn-over cdd s2k1p2 - slip 2 sts together as if to knit large set-up for heel to center pattern over knit 1 st pass 2 slipped stitches over makes a instep centered double decrease round 1 k1 tbl p1 6 times k1 tbl k2tog pm to ssk - slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as indicate new beginning of round and start of instep if to knit insert left needle through the front loops work
